title: Highest energy intensity level
description: In 2021, Trinidad and Tobago had the highest energy intensity level of primary energy at 18.72 MJ/$2017 PPP GDP.

title: Lowest GDP per unit of energy use
description: In 2022, Trinidad and Tobago had the lowest GDP per unit of energy use at 3.04 PPP $ per kg of oil equivalent.

title: Lowest GDP per unit of energy use (constant 2021 PPP)
description: In 2022, Trinidad and Tobago had the lowest GDP per unit of energy use at 2.84 constant 2021 PPP $ per kg of oil equivalent.

title: Highest energy use per $1,000 GDP
description: In 2022, Trinidad and Tobago had the highest energy use at 352.40 kg of oil equivalent per $1,000 GDP (constant 2021 PPP).

title: 100% binding coverage for all products
description: In 2022, Trinidad and Tobago achieved 100% binding coverage for all products, indicating full tariff commitments.

title: 100% binding coverage for primary products
description: In 2022, Trinidad and Tobago achieved 100% binding coverage for primary products, indicating full tariff commitments.
